92. $y=\cfrac{2x^3+x^2-2x-1}{1-x^2}=\cfrac{x^2(2x+1)-(2x+1)}{1-x^2}=\cfrac{(2x+1)(x^2-1)}{1-x^2}=-2x-1,\ x\neq\pm1.$
$$$$% TIKZ_ID{task091-solution-fig1}
